input: Describe a festival avoiding complex Shakesparean sentence structuring.

Hark! A grand festival, with revelry and cheer,
Music and merriment doth fill the air.

Food aplenty, colours bright and fair, 
Dancers leap and children laugh with glee there.  


Let me know if thou wouldst have more of this Bardly prose!
